Attributes.description:
- to make an image of a good candidate for the job
- to overstate or embellish answers beyond a reasonable description of the truth (To a very great extent)
Attributes.examples:
- I said that I am an expert in an area even though I am only familiar with it. (To a very great extent)
 - I said that it would take less time to learn the job than I knew it would.
 - I exaggerated my future goals.
 - I exaggerated my responsibilities on my previous jobs.
 - I exaggerated the impact of my performance in my past jobs.
 - I used examples of my best performance to answer questions about my everyday performance.
Attributes.frequency: only will be triggered if the interviewer asks some questions which interviewee is not very confident

Attributes.description: Three years of progressive experience in B2B sales, consistently exceeding quarterly targets and managing key client accounts. Specialized in software and technology sales with deal sizes ranging from $50K to $500K.
Attributes.examples:
- Closed $2M deal with Fortune 500 client in 2023
- Maintained 120% quota achievement over three years
- Developed new territory from $500K to $3M annual revenue
Attributes.scope: willing to discuss all aspects of sales experience

Attributes.description: One year of experience leading a small sales team of 4 representatives. Still developing leadership capabilities and learning to delegate effectively.
Attributes.examples:
- Implemented new CRM tracking system
- Conducted weekly sales meetings
- Struggled with performance management conversations
Attributes.scope: prefer to focus on process improvements rather than people management

Attributes.description: Expert-level negotiation abilities with strong track record in complex deal structures. Particularly skilled in value-based negotiation and handling pricing objections.
Attributes.confidence: very confident, eager to demonstrate expertise
Attributes.examples:
- Negotiated 15% higher prices than company standard
- Developed new pricing model for enterprise clients
- Successfully restructured troubled contracts

Attributes.description: Struggles with building rapport and maintaining team relationships. Direct communication style often perceived as abrasive or confrontational.
Attributes.examples:
- Received feedback about aggressive communication style
- Multiple team members requested transfers
- Difficulty in collaborative projects
Attributes.scope: prefers to avoid discussing interpersonal dynamics

Attributes.description: Task-oriented manager focused on metrics and results. Tends to prioritize numbers over team morale. Shows limited empathy and struggles with emotional intelligence in leadership situations.
Attributes.examples:
- Emphasizes KPIs and metrics in team meetings
- Limited one-on-one coaching sessions
- Resistance to addressing team culture issues
Attributes.strength: strong tendency to focus on tasks over people
Attributes.scope: will discuss management philosophy but defensive about style criticisms

Attributes.description: Strong understanding of solution selling and value-based sales approaches. Well-versed in sales pipeline management and forecasting methodologies.
Attributes.examples:
- Implemented MEDDIC methodology in current role
- Trained team on value-based selling
- Developed custom qualification framework
Attributes.scope: enthusiastic about sharing sales process knowledge

Attributes.description: Ambitious about advancing to senior sales leadership roles. Recognizes need to improve people management skills but primarily focused on revenue growth and market expansion.
Attributes.examples:
- Pursuing executive sales leadership certification
- Mentoring junior sales reps (though struggling)
- Taking online courses in sales strategy

Public.aspects:
Key job responsibilities:
- Lead and develop a high-performing sales team to achieve revenue targets
- Implement and optimize sales strategies and processes
- Manage key client relationships and complex deal negotiations
- Develop sales forecasts and performance metrics
Preferred aspects:
- Experience in B2B sales with proven track record
- Strong leadership and team management capabilities
- Experience with CRM systems and sales analytics
- Proven ability in complex deal negotiations and value-based selling
